name: Cyber Intelligence Operations
description: Gathering intelligence from cyberspace for strategic advantage and security.

cards.title: Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) Gathering
cards.description: Using publicly available sources for cyber intelligence collection.
cards.bulletpoints: Social media monitoring, domain research, metadata analysis

cards.title: Dark Web Monitoring and Analysis
cards.description: Tracking underground cyber threats and illicit activities.
cards.bulletpoints: TOR network reconnaissance, marketplace intelligence, malware tracking
